message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take more!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't get too greedy!
You're not giving me enough, I need more!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting away with everything!
You're getting desperate, I'll take the majority!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll give you a better deal!
You're getting close to nothing, I'll take most of it!
I'm not going to give up, I'll try to make a comeback!
You're running out of time, I'll take almost all of it!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to make a last-ditch effort!
Last chance, take it or leave it!
